// ...existing code... import React, { useState, useEffect, useContext } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import CartContext from "./CartContext"; function Product() { const [isLoaded, setIsLoaded] = useState(false); const { addToCart, count } = useContext(CartContext); useEffect(() => { setIsLoaded(true); }, []); const products = [ { id: 1, name: "Aesthetic Vase", price: 499, image: "/images/vase.jpg" }, { id: 2, name: "Minimalist Lamp", price: 899, image: "/images/lamp.jpg" }, { id: 3, name: "Wooden Shelf", price: 1299, image: "/images/table.jfif" }, { id: 4, name: "Ceramic Mug Set", price: 299, image: "/images/mug.webp" }, { id: 5, name: "Wall Clock", price: 399, image: "/images/clock.webp" }, { id: 6, name: "Throw Pillow", price: 199, image: "/images/pillow.webp" }, { id: 7, name: "Table Runner", price: 349, image: "/images/table.webp" }, { id: 8, name: "Indoor Plant", price: 599, image: "/images/plant.webp" }, { id: 9, name: "Scented Candle", price: 249, image: "/images/candle.webp" }, ]; const handleAddToCart = (product) => { addToCart(product); }; const styles = { container: { display: "flex", fontFamily: "'Segoe UI', Tahoma, Geneva, Verdana, sans-serif", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #fbeee6 0%, #f6d6c3 100%)", minHeight: "100vh", overflow: "hidden", }, sidebar: { width: "220px", background: "rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.85)", backdropFilter: "blur(10px)", padding: "24px", boxShadow: "4px 0 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", justifyContent: "space-between", borderTopRightRadius: "18px", borderBottomRightRadius: "18px", transform: isLoaded ? "translateX(0)" : "translateX(-100%)", transition: "transform 0.8s ease", }, logoBox: { textAlign: "center", marginBottom: "48px", }, logoImg: { width: "80px", height: "80px", borderRadius: "50%", objectFit: "cover", marginBottom: "12px", }, logo: { fontSize: "28px", fontWeight: "900", background: "linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%)", WebkitBackgroundClip: "text", WebkitTextFillColor: "transparent", letterSpacing: "2px", marginBottom: "8px", }, tagline: { fontSize: "14px", color: "#6366f1", fontStyle: "italic", opacity: 0.8, }, menu: { listStyle: "none", padding: 0, margin: 0 }, menuItem: { display: "flex", alignItems: "center", gap: "16px", padding: "16px 20px", color: "#1f2937", fontWeight: "600", textDecoration: "none", cursor: "pointer", borderRadius: "16px", transition: "all 0.3s ease", marginBottom: "8px", position: "relative", }, cartBadge: { position: "absolute", top: "-8px", right: "-8px", background: "#dc2626", color: "white", borderRadius: "50%", width: "24px", height: "24px", display: "flex", alignItems: "center", justifyContent: "center", fontSize: "12px", fontWeight: "bold", }, helpBox: { marginTop: "32px", padding: "24px", background: "#eef2ff", borderRadius: "20px", textAlign: "center", fontSize: "16px", color: "#6366f1", boxShadow: "0 8px 32px rgba(99,102,241,0.1)", border: "1px solid rgba(99,102,241,0.2)", }, main: { flex: 1, padding: "48px", }, productGrid: { display: "grid", gridTemplateColumns: "repeat(auto-fill, minmax(220px, 1fr))", gap: "32px", marginTop: "32px", }, productCard: { background: "#fff", padding: "20px", borderRadius: "16px", boxShadow: "0 4px 12px rgba(0,0,0,0.1)", textAlign: "center", height: "320px", display: "flex", flexDirection: "column", justifyContent: "space-between", }, productImage: { width: "100%", height: "160px", objectFit: "cover", borderRadius: "12px", marginBottom: "12px", }, }; return (
